idpRedirectEndpoint.description: The URL of the page the user will be redirected to by the plugin. Input varies based on the user.

pathToListenOn.description: The path that identity provider will post is relative to current API. Varies from user to user

customIssuer.description: Provides information which is sent to the SAML IDP and which the IDP may take action on.

authenticationRequestVerb.description: The HTTP verb that the Authentication request redirection form will be sent with.

userIdAttributeName.description: Enables find user in the SAML response attribute statement and always differs between SAML plugin users

usernameAttributeName.description: Acts in place of the default username attribute

rolesAttributeName.description: Acts in place of the default roles attribute

authIndex.description: Determines which authentication request is sent

customAuthnRequestXML.description: Custom XML to send to the IDP. Must be valid against https://tinyurl.com/atv7c8n

expectedIpPublicKey.description: A path to X509 certificate file in PEM format which contains a public key which matches the X509 certificate/key returned by Identify Provider(e.g ADFS).

signatureCountInResponse.description: EAS SAML responses contain 2 signatures and ADFS/AZURE AD SAML responses contain one signature.

easCustomIssuer.description: The issuer value in the EAS authentication request.

easAssertionConsumerUrl.description: The assertion consumer url in the EAS authentication request

HMACSecret.description: A secret string for using in conjunction with private key for generating the HMAC signature in the JWT

RSACertificate.description: Validates the signature in JWT token

RSAPrivateKey.description: Used for encrypting the JWT payload

allowNoSigning.description: Allow tokens that use an algorithm of NONE.

encrypt.description: An encrypted token (JWE) when returning a token to the caller.

denyTokenlessSubmission.description: Prevent data from being posted (POST/PUT) through the Gateway without a token

tokenTTL.description: Number of seconds before the token (and cookie) time-out

authTTL.description: Number of seconds before the authentication session times-out
